snippet: The hacker-turncoat known as Sabu charmed even those who disdained his tactics -- that is until they realized he was trying to implicate them in crime. More details on the life of Hector Xavier Monsegur.
abstract: The hacker-turncoat known as Sabu charmed even those who disdained his tactics -- that is until they realized he was trying to implicate them in crime. More details on the life of Hector Xavier Monsegur.
